vivek tewary

PhD
Mathematics Department
IIT Bombay
Mumbai, India

I defended my Ph.D. thesis in February 2020, guided by Prof. Sivaji Ganesh Sista at the Mathematics Department of IIT Bombay.

My research interests are in:

  • Homogenization of Partial Differential Equations.
  • Spectral Theory of periodic operators.
  • Almost periodic operators.
  • Quasilinear Parabolic Equations.

Email: vivektewary [at] gmail.com
